page.title:
Data Conversion Process Flow
Data Conversion Process Flow
page.normal_text:
Project Start Up Flow involve: Kickoff meeting then Review scope then start data conversion plan then identify project team then project plan review and sign off. Project Start up leads into design. Source Data/Document Review
Project Start Up Flow involve: Kickoff meeting then Review scope then start data conversion plan then identify project team then project plan
review and sign off. Project Start up leads into design.
Source
Data/Document
Review

Develop Analysis Dataset Specs Design flow involves: Source data/document review then issue identification and resolution then mapping spec development then spec QC then spec review and sign off. Design leads into data conversion.
Develop Analysis
Dataset Specs
Design flow involves: Source data/document review then issue identification and resolution then mapping spec development then spec QC
then spec review and sign off. Design leads into data conversion.

Data Conversion flow involves: Create database structure then convert source data to SDTM then domain QC and compliance checks then Convert Source create pool then comain review and sign off. Data conversion leads into publishing. Data to SDTM
Data Conversion flow involves: Create database structure then convert source data to SDTM then domain QC and compliance checks then
Convert Source
create pool then comain review and sign off. Data conversion leads into publishing.
Data to SDTM

Publishing flow involves: Create annotated CRF then create DDT and hyperlink to a CRF then QC bookmark and DDT then publishing review and sign off. Publishing leads into AdaM.
Publishing flow involves: Create annotated CRF then create DDT and hyperlink to a CRF then QC bookmark and DDT then publishing review
and sign off. Publishing leads into AdaM.

Domain QC & Adam flow involves: Develop analysis dataset specs then develop SAS programs then create Adam datasets from SDTM then Asam validation Compliance Checks then Dataset review and sign off. This concludes the Data Conversion process flow
Domain QC &
Adam flow involves: Develop analysis dataset specs then develop SAS programs then create Adam datasets from SDTM then Asam validation
Compliance Checks
then Dataset review and sign off. This concludes the Data Conversion process flow
